bibl.title: Letter from A.H. Glennan to Henry Rose Carter, April 27, 1915

div1.p: Glennan discusses studies of impounded waters.

div1.head: Letter from A.H. Glennan to Henry Rose Carter, April 27, 1915
div1.opener:
J.R.S.
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
IN REPLYING
ADDRESS THE SURGEON GENERAL
U. S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
BUREAU OF
THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
WASHINGTON
April 27, 1915.
Senior Surgeon H. R. Carter,
U. S. Public Health Service,
Marine Hospital,
Baltimore, Md.
Sir:
div1.p:
There is enclosed copy of a communication addressed
to Sanitary Engineer J. A. A. LePrince in regard to the
conduct of studies of impounded waters under your dir-
ection.

You should communicate with Surgeon R. H. von Ezdorf
regarding the exact date when Mr. Le Prince should meet
you at Montgomery.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, A H Glennan
Acting Surgeon-General. Iwn
